task_name: Implement MFA Logic with Azure Communication Services
resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of IEF XML and external REST API integration within B2C custom policies.
risk_factors: Single point of failure in Security Architect; XML debugging is time-intensive
mitigation_strategy: Backend Lead to shadow for logic review; Increase buffer by 25%

resource_notes: Complex state management required for offline-first architecture
alternative_approach: Simplify to optimistic UI updates only (high data risk)
risk_factors: Sync conflict resolution logic is complex and prone to edge cases
mitigation_strategy: Implement 'Last-Write-Wins' initially; Frontend Dev to assist with UI indicators

task_name: Setup Mapbox GL JS & React Component Shell
resource_notes: Currently blocked in Sprint 1 - needs optimization to pull forward using mocks
alternative_approach: Use Leaflet (OpenSource) if Mapbox keys delayed
risk_factors: Frontend Dev idle in Sprint 1 due to backend dependencies
mitigation_strategy: Create mock API contract to allow parallel development in Sprint 1
